titleInfo.title: Addresses, Bullets for Dead Hoods: an Encyclopedia of Chicago Mobsters, c.1933

mods.abstract: This point shapefile contains Chicago addresses mentioned in "Bullets for Dead Hoods" that were first confirmed by geospatial mapping software (GIS), and then standardized or updated based on that output. Approximately 92 percent of the addresses in the manuscript have been mapped. A CSV file containing all locations mentioned in the manuscript is included with this download.
mods.note: Klein, J. and Medeiros, D. (2020). Addresses, Bullets for Dead Hoods. In J. Corbett (Ed.) Bullets for Dead Hoods: an Encyclopedia of Chicago Mobsters, c. 1933. Soberscove Press. Available at: https://purl.stanford.edu/cr928nk7710.
This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: This record was translated from ISO 19139 to MODS v.3 using an xsl transformation.
